topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551f4f756368726a72300000#post_551f4f756368726a72300000
I think the name Gen Urobuchi is becoming more of a marketing tactic now rather than a promise of quality. I mean I love the man but he ain't perfect. Fate/Zero could have been EXPONENTIALLY better if Gilgamesh wasn't in it. And the pacing of Kamen Rider Gaim was all over the place.
